name: SED aggregated fields and their constituent fields in the report figures and tables: 2021
description: SED aggregated fields and their constituent fields in the report figures and tables: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: _b_aggregated_field_name_and_constituent_fields_b
variableMeasured.description: Aggregated field name and constituent fields hierarchy

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Beginning in 2021, a modified version of the 2020 Classification of Instructional Programs (CIP) codes was used in the survey data collection; the new broad, major, and detailed fields were used in tables reporting only the most recent data year. The historical fields used to compare the 2021 data with prior years were constructed using the SED-CIP code crosswalk in SED 2021 related detailed table A-6. Therefore, the field of doctorate data in 2021 may not be comparable to prior years; see the "Technical Notes" for more information.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Earned Doctorates, 2021.
